Text.val: 05.09.2007 SH SCR12875 Added test on TPIJ_DATEFROM/UNTIL = PI.DATEFROM/UNTIL
04.12.2006 SH SCR12143 Changed updates of TPIJ_INTRSTCHRG_ADMNO/CLNTNO with
-- If one of the input parameters is not filled, turn the job to MSGW
... store new TPIJ row is no row was found
(The subtask has to be called 3 times, because every program has to be performed
in a single transaction (TPIJ_STATUS could be updated in the calling programs,
so it's possible that all 3 programs have to be called, one by one)

ExpSyntax.val: {0,6}=0 OR {0,7}=0 OR IsDefault ({0,8}) OR IsDefault ({0,9}) OR {0,10}=0

Text.val: -- Finally update CDEP to allow restarts, so that the same client is not handled
twice, a call BPH107 to perform the final ledger bookings
